content.question: Which of the following claims regarding African American experiences with discrimination does the image best support?

choices.label: The New Negro movement eliminated indignities imposed on African Americans by Jim Crow laws.
African Americans continued to experience mistreatment as a result of Jim Crow laws.
Photographs of African Americans helped law enforcement administer segregation laws throughout the American South.
Entrepreneurs such as Madam C.J. Walker refused to market their products in department stores with segregated entrances.

content.answer: African Americans continued to experience mistreatment as a result of Jim Crow laws.
